P.S.: This game is claimed to have bugs, but probably they are firmware-related. Since everyone uses whichever firmware they want i assume you don't hesitate and try out the game. Could be you will experience no bugs at all. Cheers.

alright, ill bite. 
Be back to comment after its complete.
I'm liking your uploads. Although I have no idea what this game is about. I'm interested in seeing more Partially translated games.
my pants just got tight from the screen shots
Release is alive regardless of TPB reporting low seeds. Feel free to download. Cheers.
why cant i save the game?
I'm stuck right before going to the Chamber of Guidance right after I finish the Altar of Nervel. Others experience this problem too? Please help.

On my PSP-1000 5.50 D3, after defeating Faust for the first time on Levant's Tale, the game freezes after Philia accompanies the group to the Tower of Judgment. The Tower of Judgment does not load. I only get a black screen, but I am able to press home to exit the game.
Okay, so I'm having the same problem as chloramphenicol... Anyone else? Or is there anyone who can propose a solution?
I'm in chapter 2 and whenever I enter the crimson chamber or tower precipe. I get black screen but the game is still running and I don't hear any sounds at all.
